casebody.data:
VILLAGE MORTGAGE COMPANY
v.
James VENEZIANO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 8, 2017 Gregory T. Nolan, in support of the petition. Richard P. Weinslein, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 59 , 167 A.3d 430 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
